attributes.review: This app gave me a virus on my phone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! It takes up your data and uses your location AT ALL TIMES. I tried to not allow it but it seems like it hacks into my phone. horrible app. 🙄🙄🙄

attributes.review: this app is literally terrible. as soon as i downloaded it my phone became frozen due to all the notifications i received from it. along with this i would also like to say that donald trump is disgustingly racist and homophobic and misogynistic. it is embarrassing to call him a president. just don't download this app. it is quite literally the definition of trash and a waste of storage. do not get it.
